page.title: 14Recreation on Beeley Moor
page.content: {PEAK DISTRICT NATIONAL PARK:-}80% of Beeley moor and its environs lie in the National Park. There is public access to a large part of the area subject to bye-laws negotiated with landowners. {TOURISM:-}situated in close proximity to Sheffield, Derby, Nottingham and Manchester, the area is intersected with 'B' class roads and country lanes. There are no designated car parks or lay-byes in the area. There is one small caravan site for Caravan Club members. Visitors are welcome to the area and the land is an important part of their leisure for picnics and walking.
